item.title: About & Requme
item.description: Profile Vegan, Vipassana practicer. Works in IT as administration, architecture, and manager from year 2014, with extensive hands-on experience. Interests climate change, environment protection education innovation, spiritual development, psychology documentary, film, book Languages English: B2 Chinese: native Experiences system Server: Linux, Windows Desktop: Windows, Linux, Qubes OS Mobile: GrapheneOS BI development: MS SQL Server + MySQL + PowerBI programming: Bash, Python, SQL, PowerShell network firewall, router, switch, AP, NAC, 802.
